Intervention: Text message management prompts: YBCS will receive text message invitations on how to manage hot flashes and vaginal dryness
• Control YBCS will not receive text message prompts on managing hot flashes and vaginal dryness
Eligibility: Completion of primary breast cancer treatment
Results: Median number of daily hot flashes during week 4 of study
Description of the arm/group: Text message management invitations: YBCS will receive text message invitations on how to manage hot flashes and vaginal dryness
Unit of measurement: daily hot flashes 2.2 (1.2 to 3.6)
Description of the arm/group: YBCS Control will not receive text message prompts on managing flushes of vaginal heat and dryness
Unit of measurement: daily hot flashes 1.4 (0.7 to 2.3)
